amendment.description: To prevent the Senate from breaking Donald Trump's promise that "there will be no cuts to Social Security, Medicare, and Medicaid".

action.text: Amendment SA 19 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 19 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 6.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 19.
Amendment SA 19 proposed by Senator Sanders.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 19 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 6.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 19 proposed by Senator Sanders.
